Question: Volvo Penta CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Volvo Penta

Product: IPS Professional Platform

- Designed for superyachts and commercial marine vessels
- Features a flexible power drive system compatible with sustainable fuel alternatives
- Assisted docking and positioning feature for stability against tides and wind
- Eco Mode for automatic engine start/stop based on power needs, optimizing fuel consumption
- Introduces electric or hybrid engines running on sustainable fuels or methanol
- Aims to reduce emissions and improve fuel efficiency by up to 30%
- Commercialization planned for 2025
